title: Stocks Grind Higher Into Weekend; Bonds Steady: Markets Wrap
text: European stocks climbed with U.S. futures and Asian shares posted modest gains, as tumultuous week of trade uncertainty and fears over growth drew to close.

title: Aluminum price drop hit first-half revenues, En+ Group CFO says
text: Mikhail Khardikov, CFO of En+ Group, discusses the power producer's earnings.

title: Dow futures surge 260 points as focus remains on trade and the economy
text: At around 02:30 a.m. ET, Dow futures rose 156 points, indicating a positive open of more than 164 points.
